QuestData.Title: Crackdown
QuestData.Description: Thalyssra is right to be concerned!$b$bThe network has not responded to my attempts to re-establish connection with the Waning Crescent. I do not know what happened, but given the circumstances I believe it prudent to investigate in person.$b$b$n, would you do the honors? I will send you as close to the Waning Crescent as I can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the events of the Waning Crescent.
QuestData.RewardText: Someone must have informed the Grand Magistrix of Vanthir's involvement in the rebellion. Such violence is...$b$bElisande... How could you?
